name: Tokyo Blue
description:
Controls

Left/Right Arrows or A/D keys to steer left and right.
That's it! You will automatically accelerate.

Concept

The idea was a high speed racing game, with a twist of there being ten thousand other racers to compete with. Inspired by games like F-Zero and Dynasty Warriors, Alex and I created this prototype in only a few hours.

Source Code

https://github.com/CloneDeath/TokyoBlue
